title: Building Triangle Signal Fire Pattern
brief: Create the international distress signal using three fires arranged in a triangle pattern.
steps: Step 1: Select a clear, flat area on the highest available terrain.
Step 2: Build three separate fires in a triangle pattern with about 25 meters between each fire.
Step 3: Alternatively, arrange fires in a straight line with 25 meters spacing.
Step 4: Build and protect the fires as soon as time and situation permit.
Step 5: If alone and cannot maintain three fires, maintain one large signal fire.
Step 6: In jungle, find natural clearing or stream edge where foliage won't hide fires.
Step 7: In snow, clear ground or build platform to prevent melting snow from extinguishing fire.
warnings: Select isolated trees for tree torches to avoid starting forest fires.
In combat situations, ensure signal location has nearby hiding places.
Position signal where enemy cannot observe it but aircraft can.
